programme.title: TFC Kids Zone
programme.desc: A programme block filled with animated short stories, nursery rhymes and songs, as well as Filipino language lessons, TFC Kids' Zone promises a rich treasure trove of learning and discovery that parents and their young ones will find enriching and empowering.

programme.title: Roja
programme.desc: A paradise like no other - La Playa Roja is your ultimate escape! But behind its beauty lies danger, and soon, you'll see RED. Are you ready for the fight to survive?

programme.title: FPJ's Batang Quiapo
programme.desc: A young man rises to be one of the biggest outlaws in the neighbourhood while he navigates his way in life to survive in Quiapo. Hoping to earn the affection of his parents, his feat draws him closer to the truth about his identity.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: The lives of four individuals are turned upside down after they witness the murder of their friend. They band together to put the alleged killer behind bars, but years later, the imprisoned man seeks revenge, unraveling dark secrets that test their loyalty and survival.

programme.title: Goin' Bulilit S15
programme.desc: This comical spin-off of the 80s comedy programme Goin' Bananas is currently the Philippines' most successful children's comedy show, created and directed by one of Goin' Bananas' original stars, Bobot Mortiz.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Cruz vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Sanggang-Dikit FR
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: It features two families who compete to name the most popular answers to survey questions in order to win cash and prizes.

programme.title: Tiktoclock: Happy Hour Na
programme.desc: A game-variety show showcasing talents of Filipinos in singing, dancing and many more.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Sanggang
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: It features two families who compete to name the most popular answers to survey questions in order to win cash and prizes

programme.title: Fast Talk With Boy Abunda
programme.desc: The latest multi-platform showbiz news and talk show on Kapuso network.

programme.title: 24 Oras
programme.desc: Gives an up-to-the minute news here and around the world.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Pbb Teens
programme.desc: The TV reality competition follows the same premise as its many foreign counterparts around the world wherein a number of Filipinos volunteered to live inside a house for a certain number of days.

programme.desc: A news magazine show that offers humor and information from hard news to special interests segments on travel, health, housekeeping and entertainment.

programme.title: Pepito Manaloto, Tuloy Ang Kuwento
programme.desc: The continuing comedic chronicle of the life of Pepito Manaloto, a lucky multimillion lotto winner, his family, and the merry mix of neighbors and colleagues.

programme.title: Bblgang
programme.desc: A refreshing, exciting and funny show with an assortment of gags, spoofs, and comic performances.

programme.title: Unang Hirit
programme.desc: A news magazine show that offers humor and information from hard news to special interests segments on travel, health, housekeeping and entertainment.

programme.title: I
programme.desc: A documentary on the different issues in society hosted by a set of trusted broadcast journalists in the country

programme.title: Tadhana
programme.desc: An Overseas Filipino Workers themed weekly anthology that will dramatize the colorful, romantic, heroic, and inspiring stories of OFWs.

programme.title: Regal Studio Presents
programme.desc: A collection of weekly specials which feature timely, feel-good stories.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Sa Totoo Lang
programme.desc: Some of the country's finest actors joined the fun in this witty and totally hilarious look into the sex lives of lower middle class women who were old and single or separated, widowed, grass widowed, fooling around and everything else you could think of plus the assortment of men they met, fell for, cheated on, disliked, feared or anything else.

programme.title: Anak Ng Lupa
programme.desc: Hector learns about his parents' tragic past including his father's death at the hands of a traitor. He succeeds in killing Nestong Antok but his son, Ariosto vows to avenge his father's death. Will this vicious cycle of revenge ever end?

programme.title: Dunkin Donato
programme.desc: Donato and Buknoy has to win the championship of the interbarangay league. The money will be used to fund the many beneficial projects for the community. Will their talent be enough to win the game without having to resort to Magical Power?

programme.title: Wooly Booly (Ang Classmate Kong Alien)
programme.desc: Wooly Booly was an alien stranded on earth. A family took him in and a request to his superiors from another planet granted him an almost human appearance.

programme.title: Anghel Na Walang Langit
programme.desc: Vina Morales played two very demanding roles. Two women unrelated and who have never met, but looking very much alike, found their lives entertained when the people close to them mistook them for one another.

programme.title: Gayuma
programme.desc: This story is about an adult contemporary Filipino film that tackled the subject of paganism and black magic in the sex culture of Filipinos.

programme.title: Magdusa Ka (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Dina was the daughter of Dindo and his former maid, Nida. Aware of this fact, the girl constantly dreamt that one day she would be recognized by her father and would enjoy all the comforts of his moneyed lifestyle.

programme.title: Andrea, Paano Ba Ang Maging Isang Ina?
programme.desc: Two teachers find themselves on opposite sides in the fight for freedom. Nora Aunor is the woman who chose to join the rebels while her friend, Gina Alajar opted for a quiet life with her husband.

programme.title: Manalo Matalo, Mahal Kita
programme.desc: Mikee played the girl selling lotto tickets. Cesar spent his last ten pesos on a ticket hoping to win the jackpot. The two had some fights, which eventually fade off as both fell in love with each other.

programme.title: Kaputol Ng Isang Awit
programme.desc: An unfinished song became the key, which brought together a family forced apart by the obsessive love of a young woman for a famous singer.

programme.title: Zacarias
programme.desc: The movie depicted a different kind of action picture which included hard action scenes with touches of comedy. The action hero was waging a tough war against corruption, oppression and syndicated crime.

programme.title: Ang Utol Kong Hoodlum (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Behind his bad boy image, Ben (Robin Padilla) has a big heart. The modern day Robinhood collects grease money from jeepney drivers in behalf of the syndicate. He then gets a meager amount in return which he uses to feed his adoptive parents whom he loves dearly.

programme.title: Alabang Girls (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Alabang, an upscale suburb on the South of Manila, was the setting for this wacky tale of boys from the wrong side of the tracks, who easily fall for rich and pretty girls, who lived in Alabang.

programme.title: Nandito Ako
programme.desc: He is a lieutenant in the NBI. She is a manager of a stuff toys company. Sparks have flown when it became the lieutenant's job to bring the manager safely to Manila to become a witness. They argued, they fought and then they fell in love.

programme.title: Doctor, Doctor We Are Sick
programme.desc: The foursome, Vilma and TVJ played bumbling orderlies,whose work method was enough to send patients out of the hospital or to undeserved calamity, although they were, in truth, caring and kind-hearted and were only trying to do good.

programme.title: I Love You 3X A Day
programme.desc: An English teacher's students always play tricks on him because of his carabao English. He meets and falls in love with a fellow teacher.

programme.title: Ang Syota Kong Balikbayan
programme.desc: There is a budding romance between FPJ and Anjanette Abayari who has just returned home after living for years in the United States. But before a love triangle could be resolved there was the problem of a bag of diamonds hidden in the gasoline tank of FPJ's jeepney.

programme.title: Walang Matigas Na Pulis Sa Matikin Na Misis
programme.desc: Admired for his good looks and his popularity with the ladies, most people would call Bart (Bong Revilla Jr). But if there's one thing that grounds Bart, that's his fear of his wife.

programme.title: Ex-Rebel
programme.desc: This is the story of five young women, their adventures and misadventures in their search for Mr. Right.

programme.title: Room For Rent
programme.desc: The marriage of Jessie and Peter was suffering from a cold spell. When Jessie allowed her aerobic instructress, Sandra and her boyfriend, Johnny to rent the couple's spare room, Jessie had no idea how spiced up all their love lives would be.

programme.title: Habang May Buhay
programme.desc: Pia found herself in the same predicament as her mother did years ago. During that time, Zeny gave up her true love to marry a man whom her parents preferred. This time around Pia was engaged to Jonathan although she was in love with Gary.

programme.title: Narito Ang Puso Ko (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Ellen and Louie are estranged lovers whose son is accidentally shot by Tato, a son of a prominent politician. However, in their constant vigil besides their comatose son, their feelings towards each other are rekindled.

programme.title: Iligpit Si Bobby Ortega, Markang Bungo 2
programme.desc: More of the real-life exploits of the living legend, Col. Bobby Ortega, the military officer whose unorthodox ways of dealing with the lawless continue to sow fear in the hearts of criminals.

programme.title: Minsan Pa (Kahit Konting Pagtingin 2)
programme.desc: The sequel to the first blockbuster team-up of FPJ and Sharon Cuneta in \"Kahit Konting Pagtingin\". This time around, their roles were reversed. Now that they had been given a second chance, they became determined to find out.
